Episodes.Title: Jen the Fredo
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Jen has to entertain a group of visiting sexist yuppie executives looking for a raunchy good time. Her solution is a role playing game with the IT Crowd. Moss also uses the game to help Roy get over his breakup with the love of hi...

Episodes.Title: The Final Countdown
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Roy tries to locate a window-cleaner who left his ladders in Roy's flat, Moss becomes a member of the strange, secret, elite club of Countdown (1982) champions, and Jen investigates what's going on in the Heads of Department meeti...

Episodes.Title: Something Happened
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Douglas falls under the spell of a crazy mystic, and Jen falls under the spell of a geeky keyboard player. Moss finds it all most entertaining and worthy of popcorn. Meanwhile, Roy is forced to sue his masseur for sexual harassment.

Episodes.Title: Italian for Beginners
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Moss is obsessed with an iPhone in an arcade game. Roy is obsessed with a water park fire. Jen is obsessed with speaking Italian.

Episodes.Title: Bad Boys
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Moss and Roy blow off work and miss a party at work they really, really needed to attend, especially since instead they wander into a restricted zone where police suspect an abandoned package is a bomb.

Episodes.Title: Reynholm vs Reynholm
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Douglas' dead wife returns and sues him. Jen acts as his defence council, and Roy and Moss as his character witnesses.
